[Quarto](https://quarto.org) is an open source blogging platform written in JavaScript and distributed under the [MIT License](https://opensource.org/license/mit/).

### Examples

The following science blogs use Quarto as a platform:

* [Andrew Heiss's blog](https://www.andrewheiss.com/)
* [Chris von Csefalvay](https://chrisvoncsefalvay.com/posts/index.html) - Chris von Csefalvay is a computational epidemiologist/data scientist working at the intersection of AI, epidemiology and public health.
